oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Event Data of the Recent Wastewater Disposal Induced Earthquakes near Musreau Lake, Alberta
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Li, Tianyang
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Here are the detected event waveforms of the recent wastewater disposal induced earthquakes near Musreau Lake, Alberta. Waveform data used in this study are archived at IRIS. Our relocated earthquake catalog can be accessed in the reloc_catelog.txt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Musreau Lake
